## DropdownPropsExternallyControlled type

Props for the `Dropdown` component when the open state is controlled externally via the `isOpen` prop. In this case, the `isOpen` and `onRequestOpenChange` props must both be provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DropdownPropsExternallyControlled = DropdownPropsBase & {
    isOpen: boolean;
    onRequestOpenChange: (options: OnRequestOpenChangeOptions) => void;
};
```
**References:** [DropdownPropsBase](./dropdown-menu.dropdownpropsbase.md)<!-- -->, [OnRequestOpenChangeOptions](./dropdown-menu.onrequestopenchangeoptions.md)
